players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, Bob is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who the mafia is."
You: "Diana is the mafia. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "Alice, can you explain how you investigated Diana? We need to be sure before we accuse someone so openly."
Charlie: "Alice, if you really investigated Diana, why didn't you share any details or evidence? We need more than just accusations to trust you."
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is mafia. Charlie, I shared the evidence - my investigation result. We must vote Diana out today."
Diana: "Alice is lying. If she were the detective, she would have investigated me and known I'm innocent. She's trying to frame me to protect herself - she must be the mafia."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.
